item.title: AppBinding | KubeVault Concepts
item.description: New to KubeVault? Please start here. AppBinding CRD AppBinding CRD provides a way to specify connection information, credential and parameters that are necessary for communicating with app/service. In Vault operator, AppBinding used to communicate with vault, database, etc. This also provides flexibility to use external app/service. apiVersion: appcatalog.appscode.com/v1alpha1 kind: AppBinding metadata: name: vault-app namespace: demo spec: ... AppBinding Spec AppBinding spec contains connection, credential and parameters information.
